snippet: Gareth Bale missed Tottenham's 3-1 win over Reading on Tuesday, sitting out a yellow-card suspension earned in large part by cautions for diving. But is it really cheating?
abstract: Gareth Bale missed Tottenham's 3-1 win over Reading on Tuesday, sitting out a yellow-card suspension earned in large part by cautions for diving. But is it really cheating?

headline.main: Gareth Bale and the Inexact Science of Judging Dives
